snippet: Jiffy Lube’s new campaign seeks to set itself apart from shady mechanics and their thwarted attempts to make expensive and unnecessary repairs.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column highlights Jiffy Lube’s new campaign; notes it seeks to set itself apart from shady mechanics and their thwarted attempts to make expensive and unnecessary repairs.
lead_paragraph: Jiffy Lube’s new campaign seeks to set itself apart from shady mechanics and their thwarted attempts to make expensive and unnecessary repairs.

headline.seo: Jiffy Lube Seeks to Distance Itself From ‘the Upsell’
headline.main: A Car Shop Promises: Just the Work You Need
